code: import React from'react';import{Flex,Text}from'@pancakeswap/uikit';import{useTranslation}from'contexts/Localization';import{formatBnb}from'../helpers';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const summaryTypeColors={won:'success',lost:'failure',entered:'text'};const summaryTypeSigns={won:'+',lost:'-',entered:''};const SummaryRow=_ref=>{let{type,summary,bnbBusdPrice}=_ref;const{t}=useTranslation();const color=summaryTypeColors[type];const{rounds,amount}=summary[type];const totalRounds=summary.entered.rounds;const roundsInPercents=(rounds*100/totalRounds).toFixed(2);const typeTranslationKey=type.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+type.slice(1);const displayAmount=type==='won'?summary[type].payout:amount;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{mt:"16px",bold:true,color:"textSubtle",children:t(typeTranslationKey)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{flex:"2",flexDirection:"column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Text,{bold:true,fontSize:"20px",color:color,children:[rounds," ",t('Rounds').toLocaleLowerCase()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"12px",color:"textSubtle",children:type==='entered'?t('Total').toLocaleLowerCase():"".concat(roundsInPercents,"%")})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{flex:"3",flexDirection:"column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{bold:true,fontSize:"20px",color:color,children:"".concat(summaryTypeSigns[type]).concat(formatBnb(displayAmount)," BNB")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"12px",color:"textSubtle",children:"~$".concat(formatBnb(bnbBusdPrice.times(displayAmount).toNumber()))})]})]})]});};export default SummaryRow;
